7.text: Rewrite the following instructions in the correct order. - Then, take a big sheet of paper. - Finally, write an attractive slogan. - Next, draw a border of 2 cm on the paper. - First, discuss a topic for a poster. - And then draw a suitable picture inside the border. - After that, colour it.
